name: catachresis
text: Pat starts to become a Dick.

name: tessebatt
text: I think he started down on that path when he started wearing the pork-pie hat.

name: hipjiverobot
text:
As we know, anyone who wears a pork pie hat is a dick.

Except David Cross.

name: kamet
text: And Ramses.

name: hipjiverobot
text: Yes.

name: tekende
text: And Tom Waits.

name: tasteful
text: i bet he's a dick in real life but it would just be charming so it's cool

name: cproseedcakeksc
text: And Lester Young.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Size 2 5/8 for god's sake. that is so fucking droll. A cat's head size. That may be the funniest thing I've ever seen on achewood.
Internet, hear me howl with laughter.

name: thesoulbear
text: He is returning the pork pie hat because secretly Ray and Roast Beef's remarks hurt him deeply.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: And he had a sandwich thrown at his head

name: st-elmos_fire
text: /hat

name: mr_pete
text: Pat has no respect to himself but does not know this. He is a shame.

name: arcibi
text: In Pat's defense, it cold sucks to have a sandwich thrown at your head

name: ghostd
text: a large sandwich especially.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Unless you are dexterous enough to catch said large sandwich. Then it is awesome to have a sandwich thrown at your head.

name: tekende
text: I can't imagine that the sandwich would not fall apart during its trajectory. Unless it was something like peanut butter and jelly.

name: molesticide
text: and even if it did, and even assuming i didn't manage to catch, WHY could i not still EAT the SANDWICH?  this is a win-win situation.

name: mercuri0us
text: have you ever tried eating a thrown sandwich that you DIDN'T catch?  That is not good eating.

name: mustakrakesh
text: I will reference the previous strip and Roast Beef's poster, which says, and I quote, "Don't throw things at me"

name: afterward
text:
Maybe Beef's poster was a letter from Pat concerning the sandwich incident, which Pat delivered in person and insisted that Beef tape to his wall.

Beef acquiesced but was inwardly peeved by Pat's ill-mannered demand, and that is why he hung up on Ray in the previous strip.

name: shutup_shutup
text: This is the best solution.

name: aaron_haynes
text: /hat

name: centipede_damascus
text: Pat finds that writing angry letters helps let off the angryness.

name: madnes
text: I too have suffered Pat's indignity. It was a roast beef sandwich. I took it as a fond omen.

name: flavius
text: If I was gay, I would date Pat

name: ocarinak
text: I would definitely, definitely not.

name: semiquaver
text: I have.  I wouldn't do it again.

name: tekende
text:
you would date a cat
why would you do that though
why would you do that

name: straw
text:
Tekende:
Your poetry shows promise but your work ethic is lacking.
Please ignore my desire to relay this information to you as if I were typing with a lisp.

name: crinklebat
text: I am a big fan of ad copy...I get a lot of pleasure from reading it and imagining how many lies are contained within. Pat clearly has not yet developed this cynicism.

name: cthulhu235
text: Pat is ridiculous, this is great.

name: f1shst1ck
text: I like to see a man in a "Handsome Pork Pie Hat"

name: betwixt
text: the alt-text says "fashionablemale.com". there you will find links to a picture of a male in a pork pie hat. the picture is nothing special, the homepage is very funny.

name: spinynorman
text: Some dudes pull it off okay.

name: tehvirus
text: Tom Waits is indeed a very special boy.

name: belgand
text: I suspect that the ability to pull off a pork pie hat is strongly correlated with the ability to pull off a soul patch. Ideally these will be combined to maximum effect.

name: tekende
text: But is that really a porkpie hat? It's hard to tell. It might be a fedora.

name: charchar
text: If it is touching Tome Waits' head, it is a pork pie. A bird tried to get him one time, but it turned into a pork pie.

name: farqussus
text: I want to eat a pork pie that actually looks like that hat

name: direhaggis
text: A dude must be hell of pressure condensed into a glittering gem of hard times and low blows to pull off a porkpie hat.

name: semiquaver
text: <3! A man so devilish, even his eyebrows are pointy.

name: semiquaver
text: <3! A man so devilish, even his eyebrows are pointy.

name: thesoulbear
text:
From Wikipedia, I have learned the following:

J. Robert Oppenheimer often wore a pork pie hat.
The pork pie hat experienced a resurgence in popularity after the release of the movie "The French Connection."
In Jamaica, pork pie hats were popularized by the 1960's "rude boy" subculture.

That is all.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Are you saying that Rude Boys wear pork pies ?

name: thesoulbear
text: I dont see any how any other conclusion can be considered actual, here.

name: rowboat
text: I think what shutup_shutup meant was "Shut up. Shut up."

name: brokeaccount
text: I'd like to see someone try to throw a sandwich at Popeye fuckin' Doyle.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Wasn't that basically what that chase scene was about?

name: wurlitzergirl
text: Agreed.

name: woodenteeth
text: Is this the only time that Onstad plays with the traditional panel lay-out, I'm sure it isn't but I can't think of where else it happens.

name: snowman
text: head/hat

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I really like the two panels with the pork pie hat in question looming in the extreme foreground.

All watching Pat with remorse. Rad.

name: tekende
text: That seems like a lot of money for a bolo tie ring.

name: singtralala
text: pat's a sucker for crappy attire

name: greenkoolayd
text:
get some fucking self respect, pat! why be on your high horse all the damn time if you care so much about what people think of you?! ya cockhead!

phew! now i feel better.
